snippet.title: [Official] Thaw Trailer [Mining Visual Novel]
snippet.description:
This is a trailer of the indie game Thaw.

Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2897250/ 
Web site：https://shirokurohitsuji.studio/en/products/thaw/ 
Social Media：https://x.com/SHIROKURO_SHEEP 

Mine ores, trace your memories, and mine again. When you reach the deepest part of the mine, the long winter will be over. This quiet and gentle mining visual novel gives you a small sense of accomplishment during sleepless nights.
